art_style: Grimdark, gothic sci-fi, detailed pixel art
game_loop_mechanics: If Player Unit selected and valid target Tile clicked -> MOVE Player Unit to Tile, consuming Movement Points. If Player Unit selected and valid Enemy Unit clicked within range -> ATTACK Enemy Unit, consuming Action Points. At mission start or specific trigger -> SPAWN Player Units and Enemy Units on designated tiles. If Unit's Health Point (HP) reaches zero -> DESTROY Unit. Objectives often involve capturing specific tiles or eliminating all enemies.
rules_summary: Players command a squad of Space Marines in turn-based tactical combat against Ork forces. Units have movement and action points, varying weaponry, and health. Cover mechanics provide defensive bonuses. Objectives include eliminating enemies, capturing strategic points, or holding positions.
